title: Whether You Sleep or Wake Up - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Drama   Mature   Romance   Slice of Life   Tragedy   Yaoi
tags: Adultery   Amnesia   Character Growth   Early Romance   Handsome Male Lead   Love Triangles   Possessive Characters   R-18   Slow Romance
author: Takoyaki Taro   タコ焼き太郎
description:
When he answers the phone, his gentle and kind lover, Sumire Aoi says goodbye to him. After that, he happens to meet his ex-boyfriend who fled three years ago.

However, the main character, Satsuki Kuramoto is stabbed by someone and hits his head with that momentum. Former lover who rushed to the side, Kaede Kiryu was worried and couldn’t forgive Aoi who had been nursing all the time in the hospital and didn’t know anything.

Aoi still thinks that Satsuki likes Kiryu, so he gives up, but when he sees Satsuki injured at the hospital, he regrets breaking up.

It is a love triangle.>
